page.title: 08ARTHUR GODDARD (2)
page.content: At Chistmas time Arthur went to Oxford with his sister and Mum to do some Christmas shopping. He said for a special treat they would stop at a tea shop for tea and cakes. Then they would catch the train home back to Mansmoor Halt,from there they had to walk home. When we first went into his yard he had a lot of chickens. He also has a very large orchard at the back of his house which contained pear trees. He has a bit of allotment to grow potatoes on. When we arrived he was just going out side to sow the potatoes. He has a few fields which he uses for hay. He does not like sprays so he never uses them. In his fields grow orchids and cowslips. Fencott and the villages around might be having a motorway built but he opposes it and says that it will spoil the countryside and the peace and quiet.
